bill.title: Revenue from motor vehicle parking lots and garages operated by airport authorities; exempt from state, county and local sales tax.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 61-3-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That All Revenue Derived From Motor Vehicle Parking In Parking Lots Or Parking Garages Operated By Airport Authorities Shall Be Exempt From All State, County And Local Sales Tax; To Amend Section 27-65-23, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That A Tax Equal To Seven Percent Of The Gross Income On Such Parking Lots And Parking Garages That Are Operated By Airport Authorities Shall Not Be Levied Against Such Authorities; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Ports, Harbors and Airports;Ways and Means
